spiritsExplanation: The workout's spirit is primarily "Structured & Disciplined" with a score of 0.7 due to its focus on a progressive beginner calisthenics routine, as evidenced by the detailed timestamped breakdown and emphasis on improving body strength over time. The title and comments reinforce this, focusing on starting calisthenics and improving through structured practice. The "Flow & Rhythm" spirit is present with a score of 0.4, suggested by the "follow along" format, emphasizing continuous engagement and rhythm in execution, though it's not the primary focus. Lastly, there's a hint of "Soothing & Restorative" qualities with a score of 0.5, as the video encourages a pace personalized to the participant's ability, promoting a gentle introduction to exercise. The instructional and non-intense nature makes it beginner friendly and somewhat restorative, but not primarily focused on recovery or relaxation. High-energy elements are absent, solidifying the exclusion of "High-Energy & Intense" or "Sport & Agility" spirits.
